attributes.action: End police collusion with social services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a well known fact that when there is a police investigation into Social Services, for example, when a social worker commits perjury in the Family Courts, police are not carrying out a proper investigation in order to prosecute.  This has happened to my family on 2 occasions and this is a common practice all around the UK.
